Create a personalized training plan that takes into account the breed, age, and personality of the dog.
Incorporate positive reinforcement techniques such as treats, praise, and toys to motivate the dog during training sessions.
Encourage socialization with other dogs and people to help the dog become comfortable in different environments.
Develop a routine for training that includes both structured exercises and more relaxed playtime.
Use a combination of in-person and online resources, including books, videos, and forums, to stay up-to-date on the latest training techniques and best practices.
